data.name: Village of Zombies - Alien Citizen
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes an additional weapon, an additional character and a new map that can be played with up to 4 players in online co-op or alone in single player.

If you own this DLC, you can play the included map and even INVITE your friends who don't have this DLC. Only weapons and characters from this DLC are not playable for friends without this DLC.

data.short_description: This DLC includes an additional weapon, an additional character and a new map that can be played with up to 4 players in online co-op or alone in single player.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Prozessor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960M or comparable card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Prozessor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or comparable card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
